title: MyDiabetes: Health management
description:
Navigating through the intricacies of diabetes? Whether you're diagnosed with diabetes or confronting prediabetes, the MyDiabetes app is designed to lead your journey with accuracy. It assists in tracking your glucose and HbA1c (hemoglobin A1c) levels while also providing meal suggestions tailored to your palate.

Conveniently manage and monitor your weight, glucose metrics, and overall health trajectory. MyDiabetes, created for individuals coping with elevated blood sugar, weight issues, and other challenges linked to diabetes, extends unparalleled advice.

Experience MyDiabetes for FREE and commence your health journey. Utilize our trackers for monitoring blood sugar, A1c levels, water consumption, medications, carbs, and more.

But that's not all... Upgrading to Premium unlocks exclusive MyDiabetes features, encompassing personalized diabetic meal planning, simplified grocery lists for your weekly shop, equipment-free workouts, and a lot more.

Presented by experts and nutritionists, MyDiabetes specializes in diabetes management strategies and delectable recipes. This guarantees a pathway to improved health, weight management, and diligent tracking of your diabetic health.

We hold the conviction that everyone should live their best life. Hence, our Premium plan offers a personalized meal regime, allowing you to relish a diabetes-compatible diet without compromising on foods you love to eat.

Our mission is to foster your transformation towards a healthier lifestyle and provide unwavering 24/7 assistance. Give it a shot today and anticipate transformative, positive outcomes!

MyDiabetes FREE Features:

📉 Complete Health Tracker:
Monitor glucose, A1c, medication, and carb intake with ease. Crucial for medical reviews and ensure your health plan aligns perfectly. Seamlessly integrates with the Apple Health app.

📅 Activity Digest:
Stay informed about your app-related activities. Log meals, exercises, and hydration, and maintain a regular diabetes record with ease.

MyDiabetes Premium Perks:

🍏 Customized Diabetic Meal Advisor:
Meal plans crafted to meet your calorie, carb, sugar, and cholesterol needs, complemented by an array of healthy diabetic recipes and a carb tracker tool.

🛒 Smart Shopping Aides:
Efficiently assemble ingredients through our weekly grocery lists.

🏋️ At-Home Workouts:
Indulge in curated, equipment-free workouts. Improve your health and weight with specialized diabetic guidance.

📉 Comprehensive Health Tracker:
Track glucose, A1c, medication, and carbs seamlessly. Perfect for medical evaluations and aligning with your health goals. Also syncs with the Apple Health app.

📅 Activity Snapshot:
Remain updated with all app engagements. Note down daily meals, workouts, and hydration levels, and uphold a diabetes diary that syncs with Apple Health.

SUBSCRIPTION INFO

MyDiabetes offers both free and premium plans to access its essential features. Prices may vary based on geography, converting to local currencies. Auto-renewals are the default unless terminated beforehand.

Subscription costs might differ by region, and your local currency will reflect the charges depending on residency. The plan auto-renews unless halted beforehand.

Download MyDiabetes and embark on a tailored diabetes management expedition. Discover nutritious recipes suitable for diabetes and structure your eating habits with our meal planner and carb counter tool. Initiate your journey to tackle diabetes and weight issues today!

---

Disclaimer: Before making medical decisions, check with your doctor.

Terms and Conditions: https://mydiabetes.health/general-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://mydiabetes.health/data-protection-policy/
